content.name: Bridge Commands
content.description: Replaces the Sector Map Hotkey with a ney, context-sensitive, Command Hotkey when on one of your Ship landing Pads (also removes the Skunk from the default Platform)
content.author: UniTrader

text.name: Bridge Commands
text.description: Replaces the Sector Map Hotkey with a ney, context-sensitive, Command Hotkey when on one of your Ship landing Pads (also removes the Skunk from the default Platform)
text.author: UniTrader

text.name: Brückenkommandos
text.description: Ersetzt den Hotkey für die Sektorkarte auf eigenen Schiffen durch einen kontextsensitiven Kommando-Hotkey (und entfernt die Skunk von der Reparatur-Platform - für bessere Übersicht)
text.author: UniTrader
